1.content: You wake up in your apartment alone like usual. You go into the kitchen to get yourself some breakfast. You then hear a knock at your door. You go to see who it is. When you open the door you see https://e621.net/post/show/2013991 “hi I’m here to make your most wildest fetishes come true”. You ask her who she is. “Oh how rude of me I’m Sara the succubus”. You then invite her inside. You ask her again why she is here. “Like i said before I’m here to make your most weirdest fetishes come true”. “So what is it that your into”? You then tell her you into?
1.title: The day you met HER

choices: You and Sara are conjoined from neck down
Your conjoined with Sara but she is giantess size
